decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of disruption and removal to control the board and pressure the opponent. It aims to quickly deploy threats like Archfiend of the Dross and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, while using cards like Duress, Fatal Push, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also utilizes Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate card advantage and maintain pressure. With a strong mana base and a variety of threats and answers, this deck looks to close out games efficiently while keeping the opponent on the back foot.

This deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Valgavoth, Terror Eater. The deck also includes various support cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The combination of these cards allows for explosive plays and synergies that can overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. The deck's goal is to use its creativity and unique combos to outmaneuver and outmatch the opponent in order to achieve victory.

This deck focuses on using Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful control win condition. It utilizes a variety of multicolor spells to draw cards, remove threats, and generate value. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows for flexibility in accessing powerful spells while maintaining a consistent mana base through triomes and various lands. The sideboard companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, adds additional value with its flicker ability, providing extra card advantage and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through removal, card advantage, and powerful multicolor spells to outvalue and outlast opponents.
